name: Locate
description: The locate utility is a read-only command used to quickly find the paths of files and directories based on a database that stores updated information about all files and directories on the system. Conversely to the 'find' command which searches in real-time, locate's results depend on the freshness of its database, which is typically updated nightly by 'updatedb'. It provides a snapshot, making searches faster but potentially less accurate if files have been added or removed recently.
